item.description:
SAT NOV 14 * 8pm * SinglesCT.com invites you to the Galactic
Bowling Party on at Bradley Bowl, Windsor Locks, & SPEED Dating
Party Thur NOV 19

Meet Local Singles, No Stress - No Pressure - Just Fun Events.
We design our events for maximum enjoyment- so you can meet,
mingles, flirt and chat with other compatible people while
having a blast and making new friends! Meet someone fun and
exciting, and enjoy every moment of your life!

You may have been bowling before, but if you have not
experienced Galactic Bowling, you are missing out on an extreme
new game! Picture bowling in the middle of a Disco with the
music pumping and light flashing different colors while you
roll the ball down fluorescent lanes lit with black lights!

Watch us transform the bowling center into party central with
glowing black lights, special effect lighting, and state of the
art sound system. …it’s a whole new game!

UNLIMITED Galactic Bowling from 8 pm to Closing
Shoes, Soda, and Snacks Music, and Light Show are included

- $50 worth of Bowling, Shoe Rentals, Food and Soda (plus
prizes) for only $15
- save $5 and get your ticket in advance for only $10


Bradley Bowl
129 Ella Grasso Turnpike
Windsor Locks, CT 06096

ACROSS FROM BRADLEY INTL AIRPORT

JOIN THE PARTY! MEET HUNDREDS OF LOCAL SINGLES AND PARTY WITH
SINGLESCT.COM

Advance Tickets are only $10 online at
http://www.CentralCTS... Tickets at the event are $15

SPACE IS LIMITED - RESERVE YOUR SPOT TODAY

RECESSION BUSTER – Only $10 Online or $15 At The Event

Visit http://www.SinglesCT.... Call (860) 236-3343

Join our UPCOMING EVENTS email for special offers

UPCOMING EVENTS

Wednesday NOV 18
SinglesCT.com Monster Mini Golf Party - 7 pm. Monster Mini
Golf, 20 Main Street (Dexter Plaza), Windsor Locks, CT 06096
* Includes indoor Glow in The Dark 18 holes Mini-Golf.
RECESSION BUSTER – Only $10 Online or $15 At The Event (860) 236-3343, http://www.SinglesCT....

Thursday NOV 19
SinglesCT.com Speed Dating Party - 6 pm, Shea's American Bar &
Grill, 103 Tolland Turnpike (Route 83), Manchester, CT 06040
(Near Buckland Hills Mall)
* includes Appetizers. RECESSION BUSTER – Only $10 Online or
$15 At The Event
(860) 236-3343, http://www.SinglesCT....

Friday NOV 20
Mohegan Sun Party Bus with FREE concert featuring Saving Abel,
Pop Evil, and RED.
Bus pickups in South Windsor, Windsor, Glastonbury, Norwich
* Includes Buffet, $20 playing $$ and concert Adm. $30 before
11/13 $35 after 11/13

* THIS EVENT IS SOLD OUT *

Saturday, NOV 21
SinglesCT.com Galactic Bowling Party - 8 pm, Spare Time
Bristol, Spare Time Bristol, 177 Farmington Ave
(Route 6) Bristol, CT 06010
* Includes Unlimited Bowling, Soda, Snacks, Shoes and PRIZES !
RECESSION BUSTER – Only $10 Online or $15 At The Event
(860) 236-3343, http://www.SinglesCT....

Visit http://www.SinglesCT.... Call (860) 236-3343
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the Central CT Singles signs
